import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { motion } from "framer-motion" const Cart = ({ products, cart, addToCart, removeFromCart, totalCost }) => { return (
{cart.length === 0 &&

Your cart is empty

Go Shopping
} {cart.map((product, index) => (

{product.title}

quantity

))}
{cart.length > 0 &&
Total ${totalCost()}
} ) } export default Cart
